CustomField.description: Set to TRUE if Parental_Email_Updated__c on the parent account is set to TRUE When TRUE, fires a BP "Propagate changed parental email to attendance records" for related contacts which copies the parental email address from the account to every future attendance record
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set TRUE if Parental_Email_Updated__c on parent account is set to TRUE If TRUE, fires a BP "Copy changed parental email to attendance records" for related contacts which copies parental email address from the account to every future attendance record
CustomField.label: Parental Email Updated
